attributes.action: Act now on immigrants and immigration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government must stop playing into the hands of the BNP, and act now on immigration.A tough line must be taken on illegal and legal immigrants.If they don't have a vissa or their vissa has expired they must be deported immediatly, and not allowed to stay. With high unemployment already, a struggling NHS this government is laying the path open for the BNP to gain popularity. As seen in the euro elections on 04/06/2009. Also the influx of immigrants from within europe needs to be limited. These immigrants work for low wages and spend as little as possible in this country, they then sent monies to there home country. This damages the job market and the economy.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
